HDG.FS.content: reality of America veiled from view of those interested: collusion btwn industry/military > decision does not belong to humans, w/out this insight (man not a being that makes himself [contra Sartrean existentialism?]), sd remain w/in political opposition of civil/industrial society > society (Gesellschaft): a mirror/extension of subjectivity
